cneg
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include unary minus. The symbol ` -u ` is not a class by itself but part of a compound class definition. We do this rather than making it a formal function since it is so commonly used. Note: We use different symbols for unary minus ( ` -u ` ) and subtraction ~ cmin ( ` - ` ) to prevent syntax ambiguity. For example, looking at the syntax definition ~ co , if we used the same symbol then " ` ( - A - B ) ` " could mean either " ` - A ` " minus " ` B ` ", or it could represent the (meaningless) operation of classes " ` - ` " and " ` - B ` " connected with "operation" " ` A ` ". On the other hand, " ` ( -u A - B ) ` " is unambiguous.
blocks.origin: prop class cneg(class c0) { -u(c0) }

df-sub
blocks.content: Define subtraction. Theorem ~ subval shows its value (and describes how this definition works), theorem ~ subaddi relates it to addition, and theorems ~ subcli and ~ resubcli prove its closure laws. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1994.)

blocks.name: df-neg
blocks.content: Define the negative of a number (unary minus). We use different symbols for unary minus ( ` -u ` ) and subtraction ( ` - ` ) to prevent syntax ambiguity. See ~ cneg for a discussion of this. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1995.)

blocks.name: 0cnALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ 0cn which does not reference ~ ax-1cn . (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 7-Jan-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0cnALT() {
  |- wcel(nat0, cc)
} = {
  recni(nat0)
  mp2b(wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(ci, cc), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wceq(ci, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)))))))
  ax-icn()
  cnre(hs0, hs1, ci)
  rexlimiva(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wceq(ci, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wrex(hs1, cr, wceq(ci, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  mpd(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(nat0, cr), wrex(hs2, cr, wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), nat0)))
  ax-rnegex(hs2, cv(hs0))
  rexlimdva(hs2, cr, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), nat0), wcel(nat0, cr))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs2), cr)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), nat0), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), cr))
  readdcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  eleq1(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs2)), nat0, cr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ci)
  diff.hs1.c(ci)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(nat0, cr))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(nat0, cr))
}

thm 0cnALT() {
  ⊢ 0 ∈ ℂ
} = {
  recni(nat0)
  mp2b(0 ∈ ℝ, i ∈ ℂ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, i =(hs0[+](i[×]hs1)))))
  ax-icn()
  cnre(hs0, hs1, ci)
  rexlimiva(hs0, cr, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, i =(hs0[+](i[×]hs1))), 0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, i =(hs0[+](i[×]hs1))), 0 ∈ ℝ)
  mpd(hs0 ∈ ℝ, 0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ,(hs0[+]hs2)= 0))
  ax-rnegex(hs2, hs0)
  rexlimdva(hs2, cr, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (hs0[+]hs2)= 0, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  syl5ibcom((hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℝ), (hs0[+]hs2)= 0, 0 ∈ ℝ, (hs0[+]hs2)∈ ℝ)
  readdcl(hs0, hs2)
  eleq1((hs0[+]hs2), nat0, cr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ci)
  diff.hs1.c(ci)
  diff.hs0.w(0 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.hs2.w(0 ∈ ℝ)
}

blocks.name: negeu
blocks.content: Existential uniqueness of negatives. Theorem I.2 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm negeu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wreu(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  rexlimddv(hs0, cc, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wreu(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wrex(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  cnegex(hs0, c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wreu(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), cc), wral(s0, cc, wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))))
  syl2anr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), c1)
  ralrimiva(s0, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1))))
  bitrd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1))))
  eqeq2d(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  3eqtr3rd(c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), caddc, c1), co(nat0, caddc, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), caddc, c1, nat0, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  simplrr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  addassd(c0, cv(hs0), c1, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  addid2d(c1, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  addcand(c0, cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  simplll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  addcld(cv(hs0), c1, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  simplrl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  simpllr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  reu6i(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), cc, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  diff.hs0.w(wreu(s0, cc, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(s0)), c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cc)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cc)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, cv(hs0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm negeu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)→ ∃!(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c0[+]s0)= c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  rexlimddv(hs0, cc, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), ∃!(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c0[+]s0)= c1), (c0[+]hs0)= 0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c0[+]hs0)= 0))
  cnegex(hs0, c0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0)), ∃!(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c0[+]s0)= c1), (hs0[+]c1)∈ ℂ, ∀(s0 ∈ ℂ,((c0[+]s0)= c1 ↔ s0 =(hs0[+]c1))))
  syl2anr((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0), (hs0[+]c1)∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  simpl(hs0 ∈ ℂ, (c0[+]hs0)= 0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  addcl(hs0, c1)
  ralrimiva(s0, cc, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0)), ((c0[+]s0)= c1 ↔ s0 =(hs0[+]c1)))
  bitrd((((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ), (c0[+]s0)= c1, s0 =(hs0[+]c1), (c0[+]s0)=(c0[+](hs0[+]c1)))
  eqeq2d((c0[+]s0), c1, (c0[+](hs0[+]c1)), (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  3eqtr3rd(c1, (c0[+](hs0[+]c1)), ((c0[+]hs0)[+]c1), (0[+]c1), (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  oveq1d((c0[+]hs0), caddc, c1, nat0, (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  simplrr((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), hs0 ∈ ℂ, (c0[+]hs0)= 0, s0 ∈ ℂ)
  addassd(c0, hs0, c1, (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  addid2d(c1, (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  addcand(c0, s0, (hs0[+]c1), (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  simplll(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0), s0 ∈ ℂ)
  simpr(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0)), s0 ∈ ℂ)
  addcld(hs0, c1, (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0))∧ s0 ∈ ℂ))
  simplrl((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), hs0 ∈ ℂ, (c0[+]hs0)= 0, s0 ∈ ℂ)
  simpllr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0[+]hs0)= 0), s0 ∈ ℂ)
  reu6i(s0, (hs0[+]c1), cc, (c0[+]s0)= c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  diff.hs0.w(∃!(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c0[+]s0)= c1))

blocks.name: subval
blocks.content: Value of subtraction, which is the (unique) element ` x ` such that ` B + x = A ` . (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm subval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cc, c1, cc, cmin, crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), c0)), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), c0)))
  riotabidv(s0, cc, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)))
  riotabidv(s0, cc, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(s0)), c0, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c1, caddc, cv(s0))
  df-sub(hs0, hs1, s0)
  riotaex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)→(c0[-]c1)= iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]s0)= c0))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]s0)= c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)

thm subadd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0)))
} = {
  bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0), wceq(crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0)), c2))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0)), c2)))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  subval(hs0, c0, c1)
  3com13(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wb(wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0), wceq(crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0)), c2)))
  3impb(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wb(wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0), wceq(crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0)), c2)))
  sylan2(wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0), wceq(crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0)), c2)), wreu(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  negeu(hs0, c1, c0)
  riota2(hs0, c2, cc, wceq(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c1, caddc, cv(hs0)), c0, co(c1, caddc, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1, caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0))
}

thm subadd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ)→((c0[-]c1)= c2 ↔(c1[+]c2)= c0))
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ), (c0[-]c1)= c2, (c1[+]c2)= c0, iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]hs0)= c0)= c2)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ, ((c0[-]c1)= c2 ↔ iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]hs0)= c0)= c2))
  eqeq1d((c0[-]c1), c2, iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]hs0)= c0), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  subval(hs0, c0, c1)
  3com13(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ, ((c1[+]c2)= c0 ↔ iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]hs0)= c0)= c2))
  3impb(c2 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ, ((c1[+]c2)= c0 ↔ iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]hs0)= c0)= c2))
  sylan2(c2 ∈ ℂ, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ∈ ℂ), ((c1[+]c2)= c0 ↔ iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]hs0)= c0)= c2), ∃!(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[+]hs0)= c0))
  negeu(hs0, c1, c0)
  riota2(hs0, c2, cc, (c1[+]hs0)= c0, (c1[+]c2)= c0)
  eqeq1d((c1[+]hs0), c0, (c1[+]c2), hs0 = c2)
  oveq2(hs0, c2, c1, caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w((c1[+]c2)= c0)
}

  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2)), caddc, c2), cmin, c2, co(c0, caddc, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))

  oveq2d(c0, caddc, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c1))
  npcan(c1, c2)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2)), caddc, c2), cmin, c2), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  addcld(c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))

blocks.name: pncan3oi
blocks.content: Subtraction and addition of equals. Almost but not exactly the same as ~ pncan3i and ~ pncan , this order happens often when applying "operations to both sides" so create a theorem specifically for it. A deduction version of this is available as ~ pncand . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: subcan2
blocks.content: Cancellation law for subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 8-Feb-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm subcan2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c1, cmin, c2)), wceq(c0, c1)))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c1, cmin, c2)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c0))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c1, cmin, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  subcl(c1, c2)
  subadd2(c0, c2, co(c1, cmin, c2))
  syl6bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c0), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c0))
  eqeq1d(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c1))
  npcan(c1, c2)
  eqcom(c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: subsub2
blocks.content: Law for double subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm subsub2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))), c0))
  3eqtrd(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))), c0, co(c0, caddc, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))), co(c0, caddc, nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  add12d(co(c1, cmin, c2), c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  oveq2d(c0, caddc, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), nat0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), nat0))
  npncan2(c1, c2)
  addid1d(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))), c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), cc))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  subcl(c1, c2)
  addcld(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  subcl(c2, c1)
  subadd(c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)))
}

blocks.name: subsub4
blocks.content: Law for double subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 19-Aug-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm subsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmin, c2), co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmin, c2), co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2)), caddc, c2), co(c0, cmin, c1)))
  nppcan2(c0, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmin, c2), co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2)), caddc, c2), co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cc))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  subcl(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c2), cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  addcld(c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  subcl(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2))
  subadd2(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, co(c0, cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
}

blocks.name: npncan3
blocks.content: Cancellation law for subtraction. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Jun-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm npncan3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c0)), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c0)), co(c2, cmin, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c0)), cmin, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c0)), cmin, c1), co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c0))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cc))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cc))
  subcl(c2, c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  addsub(c0, co(c2, cmin, c0), c1)
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c0)), cmin, c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c0)), c2))
  pncan3(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: pnpcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for mixed addition and subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm pnpcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2)))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), cmin, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), cmin, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c2))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  addcld(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  subsub4(co(c0, caddc, c1), c0, c2)
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), cmin, c2, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))
  pncan2(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: pnncan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for mixed addition and subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm pnncan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c2)), co(c1, caddc, c2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c2)), co(c1, caddc, c2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), caddc, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmin, c2)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  addcld(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  subsub(co(c0, caddc, c1), c0, c2)
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), caddc, c2, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c1))
  pncan2(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: ppncan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for mixed addition and subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm ppncan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(c0, caddc, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(c0, caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2), co(c1, caddc, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)))
  addcom(c0, c1)
  syld3an1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  addcl(c0, c1)
  subsub2(co(c0, caddc, c1), c1, c2)
  3com12(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c0), cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(c0, caddc, c2)))
  pnncan(c1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: addsub4
blocks.content: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a mixed addition and subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm addsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(c0, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmin, c3))))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(c0, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmin, c3)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c2), cmin, c3), co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), caddc, c1), cmin, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c2), cmin, c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), caddc, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c2), co(co(c0, cmin, c2), caddc, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  addsub(c0, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c2), cmin, c3), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c2, caddc, c3))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  addcld(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  subsub4(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, c3)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), caddc, c1), cmin, c3), co(co(c0, cmin, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmin, c3))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c2), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c2), cc))
  subcl(c0, c2)
  simplr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  addsubass(co(c0, cmin, c2), c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: negsub
blocks.content: Relationship between subtraction and negative. Theorem I.3 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1997.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm negsub(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr2d(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, co(nat0, cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat0), cmin, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, co(nat0, cmin, c1))))
  oveq2i(c0, caddc, cneg(c1), co(nat0, cmin, c1))
  df-neg(c1)
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, nat0), cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, co(nat0, cmin, c1))), wcel(nat0, cc))
  0cn()
  addsubass(c0, nat0, c1)
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, nat0), cmin, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))

thm subneg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(c0, cmin, nat0), caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl5eq(co(c0, cmin, cneg(c1)), co(co(c0, cmin, nat0), caddc, c1), co(c0, cmin, co(nat0, cmin, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq2i(c0, cmin, cneg(c1), co(nat0, cmin, c1))
  df-neg(c1)
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(nat0, cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, cmin, nat0), caddc, c1)), wcel(nat0, cc))
  0cn()
  subsub(c0, nat0, c1)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmin, nat0), caddc, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(c0, cmin, nat0), c0))
  subid1(c0)
}

blocks.content: Closure law for negative of reals. (Note: this inference proof style and the deduction theorem usage in ~ renegcl is deprecated, but is retained for its demonstration value.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-1997.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm renegcli(class c0) {
  |- wcel(cneg(c0), cr)
  -| wcel(c0, cr)
} = {
  mp2b(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  ax-rnegex(hs0, c0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, cr, wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
  sylbird(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wceq(cneg(c0), cv(hs0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wb(wceq(cneg(c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  recn(cv(hs0))
  syl5bb(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cneg(c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(co(nat0, cmin, c0), cv(hs0)))
  eqeq1i(cneg(c0), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cmin, c0))
  df-neg(c0)
  mp3an12(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wb(wceq(co(nat0, cmin, c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(nat0, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  0cn()
  recni(c0)
  subadd(nat0, c0, cv(hs0))
  eleq1a(cv(hs0), cr, cneg(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm renegcli(class c0) {
  ⊢ -u(c0)∈ ℝ
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℝ
} = {
  mp2b(-u(c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(c0[+]hs0)= 0))
  ax-rnegex(hs0, c0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, cr, (c0[+]hs0)= 0, -u(c0)∈ ℝ)
  sylbird(hs0 ∈ ℝ, (c0[+]hs0)= 0, -u(c0)∈ ℝ, -u(c0)= hs0)
  syl(hs0 ∈ ℝ, (-u(c0)= hs0 ↔(c0[+]hs0)= 0), hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  recn(hs0)
  syl5bb(hs0 ∈ ℂ, -u(c0)= hs0, (c0[+]hs0)= 0, (0[-]c0)= hs0)
  eqeq1i(-u(c0), hs0, (0[-]c0))
  df-neg(c0)
  mp3an12(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ((0[-]c0)= hs0 ↔(c0[+]hs0)= 0), 0 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  0cn()
  recni(c0)
  subadd(nat0, c0, hs0)
  eleq1a(hs0, cr, -u(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(-u(c0)∈ ℝ)
}

thm subaddeqd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, caddc, c3), co(c2, caddc, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3), co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3)), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3)), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, c3), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3), co(c2, caddc, c1), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3), co(c1, caddc, c2), w0)
  addcomd(c2, c1, w0)
  pnpcan2d(c0, c3, c1, w0)
  pnpcand(c1, c2, c3, w0)
}

thm addlsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2), wceq(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2), wceq(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)))
  syl5(w0, wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2), wceq(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
  oveq1(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, cmin, c1)
  mpan2d(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0))
  pncand(c0, c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wi(wa(wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0)), wceq(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1))))
  eqcomd(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), wa(wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0)))
  eqtr2(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1), c0)
  syl5(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(c2, cmin, c1), caddc, c1)))
  oveq1(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), caddc, c1)
  mpan2d(w0, wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(c2, cmin, c1), caddc, c1)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2), wceq(co(co(c2, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), c2))

blocks.name: addid0
blocks.content: If adding a number to a another number yields the other number, the added number must be ` 0 ` . This shows that ` 0 ` is the unique (right) identity of the complex numbers. (Contributed by AV, 17-Jan-2021.)
